from abc import ABC, abstractmethod



[docs]class PrintFile(ABC):
  
  def __init__(self, path, xCount=1, yCount=1, width=800, height=800):
    
    self.path = path
    self.xCount = xCount
    self.yCount = yCount
    self.width = width
    self.height = height

    self.xNumber = None
    self.yNumber = None

  def __enter__(self):
    self.fp = open(self.path, 'wt')

    return self

  def __exit__(self, *args):
    self.fp.close()

  @abstractmethod

[docs]  def startRegion(self, xOutputRegion, yOutputRegion, xNumber=0, yNumber=0):
    pass


  @abstractmethod

[docs]  def writeLine(self, x1, y1, x2, y2, colour='#000000'):
    pass


  @abstractmethod

[docs]  def writePolyline(self, polyline, colour='#000000'):
    pass


  @abstractmethod

[docs]  def writeText(self, text, x, y, colour='#000000', fontsize=10, fontfamily='Verdana'):
    pass
